summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent transmitting a 302 report regarding the seizure of hard drives associated with a DVR/video system from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The agent indicates they will forward additional emails about the DVRs and video system.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force who is sending the 302 report and related emails about seized hard drives from the MCC.

events.title: Seizure of hard drives from MCC
events.description: Hard drives associated with a DVR/video system were seized from the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: Hard drives associated with a DVR/video system were seized from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force is handling the evidence and related communications.
The agent indicates there are multiple emails dating back to the beginning concerning the DVRs and the video system.
